text: In a village in India there was a skilled thief who robbed every house and could never be caught. He was a real expert. The local people, demoralized, met with the mayor and asked him to name a police officer, since there was no one in the village and so the thief managed to act in his air and without any risk. The mayor, understanding the discouragement of the local people, handed over a side requesting people to present themselves to the police station. Only one candidate has been nominated. It was the thief and he was elected police officer. FIN
title: El ladrón policía
author: nan Anónimo
